title: Place
description: A record for a place, including both physical spaces and mental/conceptual places that may not be locatable on a geospatial system

type.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.description: A related concept to a given entity provided by another authority file. May be understood via a skos:closeMatch property
A reference number in a standard reference work, such as the Corpus Clavium Graecorum (CPG)

items.title: Bibliography
items.description: A bibliographic citation connected with an object or entity

type.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

items.description: A reference to a controlled term that is stored in a database table, referenced via ID but including a human-readable label

contributor.description: The person responsible for the intellectual contributions made to the record via this change

added_by.description: The user account responsible for editing the JSON record, likely supplied by the content management system
